text: Egha e arazir Godɨn damazimɨn zuezibagh amua, egha guizɨn akamɨn fofozimɨn suira. E akamadariba ikarvagha egha bemɨram atarir puvatɨ. E arazir aghuibar gumazamizibagh ami. E Godɨn Duamɨn gavgavim iti. E igharaz darazigh ifongezir arazim guizbangɨram a gami. E arazir kabagh amua kamaghɨn ian aka, e guizbangɨra Godɨn ingangarir gumaziba.
